tweets.text:
"The site has been breached for discharges from storm tanks during non-storm conditions."

In English. Berkhamsted STW is operating illegally by dumping sewage into the River Bulbourne, a chalk stream, 1 of only 225 in the entire world.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/SCyPhZUuaR

Heard from sources that the @EnvAgency are planning to radically change their pollution response procedure. Will now only attend serious pollution incidents. Begs the question define serious & how would they know if they do not attend? Replace one broken system with another.

@SevernUnlocked @CanalRiverTrust @severnrivers @EnvAgencyMids @HeritageFundM_E @LIFEprogramme Are you going to install a bike rack so families and individuals can secure their bikes whilst visiting the viewing gallery? @BikeWorcester @myworcester @CanalRiverTrust @worcesternews

Act 1. A sociopath hacks in to @EnvAgency phone so he can dump more waste than they allow in a hole. He gets caught and does time. Act 2. Sociopath gets another hole, dumps more waste than they allow but gets away with it because he found out in Act 1 how to get away with it! https://t.co/tmMb28HMuA

tweets.text:
Via the NEW Diglis fish pass, twaite shad can now swim past #Worcester on their #SevernShadRun for the first time in nearly 180yrs! 🎉🐟🎉 
Please watch & share our video! #FollowTheShad #FishMigration @CanalRiverTrust @severnrivers @EnvAgencyMids @HeritageFundM_E @LIFEprogramme https://t.co/kzh7NFPljc

UPDATE 8/5/21 from @SFRS_GWilliams 
We are expecting the smoke plume to increase and decrease through the day due to activities. This will be monitored by partners for air quality and also the impacts on the M54. @shropsfire @TelfordWrekin @BBCShropshire @EnvAgency @bbcmtd https://t.co/cgI2GeY57u
Please sign the petition. @AnglianWater dumped raw sewage in the Lark for 439 hours in 2021, according to the @EnvAgency https://t.co/iik6D9Xdi2 https://t.co/re8LD6i2U3

@fayedavies @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids No whitewashing should be endured and no more soothing words and empty promises. @RedIndustries2 has to do more than the bare minimum and play their role as a genuine part of the community. No more lip service. #StopTheStink @DaveJonesNuL @CllrTonyK @AFH7_fbu @CllrStubbsNUL https://t.co/iIGyYCCOC2
Absolutely dreadful!!!!!!!! Should not be allowed! @BorisJohnson @EnvAgency https://t.co/Z2B0rYKkml

tweets.text:
@SimonTagg @StinkStopthe RED have applied to increase work at Sneyd Hill Ind Estate.
@EnvAgencyMids SAY NO! The smell from there is already ghastly & has need been reported on before It drifts across High Lane, Stanfields (School & Hospital) & Acreswood. No more stink!

Long-distance walker Ian Hirst from Shaftesbury is doing 'Source to Sea' on the #ThamesPath National Trail, plus the north bank of the estuary to Southend. 
Shared walking stories with @EnvAgencySE Michael Cragg, relief lockkeeper at #Benson freshening up the paintwork today. https://t.co/exSRXNiAJP

tweets.text: @SianieRoo @HelenVi00175623 @davemh72 @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @MattHancock @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @Cap_it_off @JournoJess_ @StinkStopthe @Helenri51988976 H2S got into the house again but I turned the air purifiers up full blast & that took the edge off. The purifiers make the house cold, but shivering in bed feels preferable to breathing in poisonous landfill gas. I managed to get some sleep and hope you did too 🙏 Sending love ❤️

tweets.text: @metecoban92 @PhilipGlanville @chrismylesk @EnvAgency @HackneyLabour How is the conversation with @EnvAgency going? Have you been down to the #Lea river today @metecoban92 and @philipglanville? Rubbish floating in big islands and a strong smell of sewage. So sad.

Together with Mayor @PhilipGlanville and Cllr @ChrisMylesK, we wrote a letter to @EnvAgency demanding action to clean up River Lea. 

It’s unacceptable and we deserve better. Thank you to all of you who got in touch. https://t.co/FuIJDv5kz0

@a_merrydew @SianieRoo @davemh72 @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @MattHancock @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @Cap_it_off @JournoJess_ @StinkStopthe You're an inspiration to me. I was fighting back the tears seeing your poor cat by the air purifier 😢❤️ Everyone is brilliant and I'm so proud of our community. Just a bit of a low night for me but after some sleep (hopefully) I will be back fighting ❤️❤️xx

tweets.text: @DrEdHenderson Should reservoirs be kept full to provide water supply or empty to provide flood mitigation? #ItsAllAboutBalance this is why we need a new Water Resources & Flood Management Authority and not a licensing & enforcement agency trying to manage resources.

@HelenVi00175623 @a_merrydew @davemh72 @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @MattHancock @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @Cap_it_off @JournoJess_ @StinkStopthe Hope you get some sleep tonight @Helenri51988976 I managed a nap today when my son took a rare one which was lovely. Hence being back on from! Lots of love to you all ❤️

tweets.text:
I've heard the @EnvAgency are surprised NGOs are refusing to work with them.

Why?

The River Avon catchment is comprised of 5 chalk streams protected as SSSI and SAC. In 2020 @wessexwater spent 26,916 hours dumping sewage into the river.

https://t.co/zslGdsV3lC

tweets.text: However you look at it all agency’s are allowing thousands of us to be poisoned in our homes turning them in to gas chambers @StaffordshireCC @NewsNBC @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @ClareDinnisEA @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #StopTheStink @cleanairdayuk do the right thing close it down https://t.co/BcmcFS5C6a

Source to Spaghetti. The River Rea runs from Waseley Hills Country Park for 14 miles to the River Tame at Spaghetti Junction in Birmigham @stwater @EnvAgencyMids @CRTWestMidlands @KeepBritainTidy https://t.co/wr4juSNALR

tweets.text: @davemh72 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @NewsNBC @Cap_it_off Yes , this is one that I shared earlier too. There are many many more. Clearly @PHE_uk @NewsNBC should do their due diligence before putting pen to paper. #embarassing @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency

https://t.co/9wX7a8zVSx
Recognise this? @EnvAgency is not fit for purpose! Odour for years.. no firm action has led to an #environmentaldisaster. An independent enquiry to audit actions undertaken as a result of our complaints is essential. @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe @NewsNBC https://t.co/RyMPNaKxAQ

@DrAmirKhanGP @sabinashaw20 The LFG builds up at night in calm conditions then floods local communities, sometimes thermally drawn or slight wind, the gas is broken down during the day with UV light so not so evident in Summer!
People are being polluted in their homes at night, wake up authorities to this! https://t.co/yTLBbpfSfh

@EnvAgencyMids I'm fed up of you saying there's unlikely to be 'long-term' health impacts. What about our stress & anxiety levels? Sleep deprivation? Our inability to go outside for exercise? I've cried every day this week because the odour has worsened. We've had no respite from this hell.

tweets.text:
Read our update to the situation at #WalleysQuarry 👉 https://t.co/o558iBcT3V

Our on-site inspection shows capping work required by the enforcement notice we issued is complete but we still need verification of the work by an independent construction quality assurance assessment https://t.co/12ep6fp39O

Grow your network in Natural Flood Management 🤝

Hear from NFM experts inc. @YorkshireWater’s Granville Davies, Matt Hodkin and Jenny Barlow from @EnvAgency and Will Mayes from @UniOfHull on how your business can innovate in this emerging sector. Book ⬇️

https://t.co/a1Sgc95D6q https://t.co/bhCvaXOmdR

tweets.text: @SimonTagg @NewsNBC @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL I’ve officially asked the EA if the 4 monitoring stations can provide real time data feeds to local residents via a website. I see no reason why this isn’t already being done? Residents need this information to safeguard themselves given published instances above permitted levels
